thread.title: Dip in bank stocks is a case of short-term nervous money, says Wells Fargo's Margie Patel.

title: Dip in bank stocks is a case of short-term nervous money, says Wells Fargo's Margie Patel.
text:
Dip in bank stocks is a case of short-term nervous money, says Wells Fargo's Margie Patel. Friday, April 13, 2018 - 03:42 
The three big U.S. banks reporting earnings came out with positive outlooks, says Margie Patel, senior portfolio manager at Wells Fargo Asset Management. She adds, technology will set a key note for other sectors. Aleksandra Michalska reports.   
The three big U.S. banks reporting earnings came out with positive outlooks, says Margie Patel, senior portfolio manager at Wells Fargo Asset Management. She adds, technology will set a key note for other sectors. Aleksandra Michalska reports.  //reut.rs/2IQEZCG
